text.text_translated: One defence is to blow up an asteroid with a nuclear weapon. This could be used against a dangerous asteroid moving toward Earth. It may sound like a film plot. It was the subject of the 1998 movie *Armageddon*. The plan is called HAMMER. It would use eight‑ton rockets. The rockets would be aimed at the asteroid that is coming toward Earth. The rockets would try to push the asteroid off its path. If the asteroid is too close for this to work, the rockets would carry nuclear bombs to destroy it.
